posts.post_content:
SOLD 
LOOKS REALLY NICE,I DON'T UNDERSTAND THIS GRADE 
[URL="http://s97.photobucket.com/albums/l239/dcc1/?action=view&current=TREUBACH.jpg"][IMG]http://i97.photobucket.com/albums/l239/dcc1/TREUBACH.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
bump for price drop. price includes shipping

Send me payment details please. Thanks!
 
---Donny Muth

Dennis,
 
  I received the T206 Reulbach card yesterday.  It's quite nice and I'm very pleased with it.  You're right - it looks much better than an SGC 30.  Surely a 40, possibly a 50 or more.  I don't know what SGC saw to warrant the 30 grade.  Oh well... that's why you buy the card and not the holder right?!  Glad I got this one.  Thanks again!
